title.rendered: Creative Websites That Work Harder, So You Don’t Have To

content.rendered:
Creative &
Innovative
Ideas

What sets us apart?

We’re a family-run business, which means you get a personal touch and real partnership. By combining our unique skill sets, we offer complete, end-to-end solutions you wouldn’t usually find under one roof.

“Design is the silent ambassador of your brand.”

PAUL RAND

01

Services

Our six core angles

See What We Do

Web Development

Crafted code, clean experiences.

From one-page sites to complex platforms, we build fast, secure, and scalable websites that look as good as they perform. Mobile-first. Pixel-perfect. Built for growth.

Content Creation

Words that work, stories that sell.

We craft compelling blog posts, product descriptions, and multimedia content that speaks your brand voice—and gets results. Content that connects, converts, and climbs SEO ranks.

SEO

Get found where it matters.

Technical audits, on-page tuning, keyword strategy, and content optimisation—all tailored to boost your visibility and bring organic traffic straight to your door.

Photography

Real, striking, and brand-aligned.

From product photography to lifestyle shoots, we create high-quality visuals that elevate your brand’s image and engage your audience on every platform.  We use our professional rigging and editing to ensure the best results.

Branding & Design

Design with meaning. Brands with voice.

We shape identities that stick—logos, colour systems, typography, and beyond. Whether you’re launching or levelling up, we’ll help you look as sharp as you sound.

Website Maintenance

Stay fast. Stay safe. Stay fresh.

We keep your website running smoothly with regular updates, backups, security scans, and performance tweaks. No stress, just support you can trust.

02

Why Us

How we do it

Gain Digital Advantage

Innovation

We believe innovation should feel personal.
It’s not just about using the latest tools — it’s about solving real problems in new ways. Every project we take on is a chance to push boundaries and build something better.

Results-Oriented Solutions

Strategic insights

We don’t guess — we guide.
Every brand, every website, and every piece of content we create is backed by insight, research, and purpose. We align your goals with what actually works online, so your digital presence isn’t just beautiful — it’s effective.

From Art to Science

Personalised tactics

Your business is unique — so are our solutions.
We take the time to understand your needs and build a plan that fits. Whether you’re launching or scaling, we’ll guide you with personalised strategies that make sense for where you are now.

Honest & Reliable

Real partnership

Family values, digital expertise.
As a family-run studio, you’re not just another client — you’re part of something personal. We’re approachable, dependable, and with you for the long haul.

Local Businesses
0

Let's Make It
68 %
03

About Us

Who we are

see who we are

We’re Hexivox — a family-run studio blending creativity, code, and care.

We are the decisive factor behind your success

Rooted in trust and driven by innovation, we help small businesses and startups bring their digital presence to life. From stunning websites to content, SEO, and branding, we offer thoughtful solutions with a personal touch — the kind you won’t find in big agencies.

04

Packages

Our most popular packages

Basic Blue Starter Package – £299

  • 1–3 pages (Home, About, Contact)

  • Mobile-responsive design

  • Basic SEO setup

  • Contact form

  • 1 round of revisions

  • Delivery: 1–2 weeks

View the blue

Pink Pro Package – £599

  • 5–7 pages

  • Mobile + tablet optimisation

  • On-page SEO (titles, meta, headings)

  • Blog or portfolio setup

  • Custom branding integration (you provide logo, colours)

  • 2 rounds of revisions

  • Delivery: 2–3 weeks

View the pink

Yellow E-Commerce Package – £999+

  • Up to 10 pages

  • WooCommerce or Shopify setup

  • Payment gateway configuration

  • Product setup (first 10 included)

  • SEO setup

  • 2 rounds of revisions

  • Training on how to update site

  • Delivery: 3–4 weeks

View the Yellow

Orange Optional Add-Ons

  • Website hosting: £10/month

  • Maintenance & updates: £25/month

  • Logo design: £99

  • Copywriting: £50/page

  • Email setup: £49

  • E-commerce £400

  • Adult Content Services (read more here) £595+

  • Product Photography

    • Per Product (basic): £10–£30

    • Styled Product Sets: £100–£400 per session

    • Day Rate: £250–£600+

     

View the orange
05

Experience

Past Project Experience

With over 15 years of experience, we’ve had the privilege of supporting a wide range of smaller businesses — from local retailers and independent cafes to colleges and community organisations. Having worked across both agency and in-house roles, we bring a flexible, down-to-earth approach to every project.
